attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To set up a referendum amongst the general public, due to the latest increase in crimes of murder, about the re-introduction of Capital Punishment; because the elected Members of Parliament, of any Party, completely fail to listen to their Electorates voices! We as the Electorate, feel that we are being ignored by our, so called, Government! The amount of murder and crime at the moment has forced me, to this now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
